extendedInfo.description: The aRFR from Electronic Theatre Controls, Inc. provides a riggers remote for any Eos or Congo Family product.  This application can be used with both operating systems and requires Eos family software 1.9.6 or higher and Congo family software 6.1 or higher installed on the connected lighting system. The aRFR supports all of the features on the Net3 RFR product, adding more functionality through the use of the touchscreen.  The exact features of the aRFR are sourced by the connected control system; not all features are supported for both platforms.  Check the documentation for your console. Download the free tryout version of this application and verify that it runs on your specific Android device. In tryout mode, the software will disconnect every 10 minutes, and after 5 days, the option to connect will be disabled. You will then have to buy the full version. To be able to buy the update, you need to run Android 2.2 or later due to current limitations in the Google purchasing service.With the aRFR on Eos Family products, you can:â¢    Select channels and set parameter dataâ¢    Playback and edit cuesâ¢    Park channelsâ¢    Conduct dimmer and channel checksâ¢    Patch conventional fixturesâ¢    Manipulate Color, Pan/Tilt and other parameters using dedicated graphical controllersâ¢    View a Cue List Display (monitor only), with current cue, several previous and pending cues displayedâ¢    View and interact with a Playback display; controls include Go, Stop/Back and Go to CueWith the aRFR on Congo Family products, you can:â¢    Select channels and set parameter dataâ¢    Playback and edit presetsâ¢    Conduct dimmer and channel checksâ¢    Patch conventional fixturesâ¢    Manipulate Color, Pan/Tilt and other parameters using dedicated graphical controllersâ¢    Calibrate Scroller Rolls

reviews.title: No actual Test phase
reviews.comment: You can set up the board, but you can\'t actually connect to it unless you buy the premium version of the app.  It\'s labeled as a \"Test Period\", but it\'s actually impossible to test it if you can\'t connect to the board.  No way am I going to pay $50 for an app if I can\'t try it first.  This is a complete waste of space... don\'t bother downloading it unless you\'re planning on buying it immediately.  ETC should be ashamed of themselves for misleading potential customers.
reviews.author: Jeremy Ellwood

reviews.title: How did I survive without this?
reviews.comment: This tool is amazing. I am not the board op, but as the gaffer it\'s comforting to know that I can do the simple things if my board op is 10-1 or at crafty or setting up another stage.
reviews.author: Jeremy Graham

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: I used this on my most recent production to run channel check and to pull up cues for a photo call from in the house. Made my life so much easier!
reviews.author: Ryan McSherry

reviews.title: Really nice.
reviews.comment: Just spent a day focusing lights with this thing.  For an old designer who started out on resistor plates it is amazing.  Had a few difficulties with the wi-fi but managed to solve them without having to find a junior high kid. Big thank you to the developers both for the software and the donation idea.
reviews.author: Richard Gamble

reviews.comment: Very handy,  but it would be nice to be able to patch different parts of a channel.  ie,  address 2@ channel 1 part 3....
reviews.author: Morgan Cerovski

reviews.title: Great while connected!
reviews.comment: Please make it so the rfu connection doesn\'t time out at 5 minutes in the next update!
reviews.author: Seah Johnson

reviews.title: Brill
reviews.comment: Awsom app use it all the time to flast through the channals and to focus lights makes everything sooo mutch easyer however it would be even better if there was a dimmer wheal and t didnt lag so much when useing mooveing heds. Pkease update and will give it 5 stars. Acer 500 tab.
reviews.author: Ben Pereira

reviews.title: Gear app but...
reviews.comment: I already paid for the iOS version, I know its charitable but I really don\'t want to pay for it twice.  That complaint aside, the app is great. I use it on our house iPad to run the ION.
reviews.author: Dustin Shryock

reviews.title: Great, Simple App
reviews.comment: Cheaper and better than the iRFR. Works best on a tablet!
reviews.author: Daniel Dansby

reviews.title: The money goes to charity
reviews.comment: Great app with some issues.  Needs an update for the tablet version so the functionality matches the IPad version. Will give 5 stars then.  Remember the 50 bucks goes to charity that you yourself might be in need of someday.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I use this to control our ion system on a national tour, and have been very pleased. Another reason to stick with ETC products.  Read the notices. The free version is a limited trial. If you\'re trying to circumvent the payment (to charity), maybe you should reconsider your financial priorities in life. This is a powerful tool, not an ad-supported game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Display format issues
reviews.comment: Display not formatted correctly for Galaxy S3 III running CM9 (ICS) . Disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally Here!
reviews.comment: I am very glad this has come out been looking forward to this for a long time.  Although it times out every 10 minutes and wants you to update it to the full version every time very good app.  Very easy to set up and use.  A little gleatchy on the RFR the top flashes a bit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: Amazing app been waiting forever for this app on android.  Although it times out and you have to uninstall every like 5 days and reinstall it. What it does need is focus pallets on it instead of manual focusing each light.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app. Has issues
reviews.comment: Screen size not formatting properly to suit larger size phones. S3 etc. Overlays graphics ontop of one another. Pls fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not sure why....
reviews.comment: Getting \"expired\" bit just now DL\'d. Is iy because i havent \"set ip\" a console in settings yet?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Test too short
reviews.comment: I wasn\'t even able to attach to my lightboard to try it out before it expired and made me buy the full $50 app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Great app, and when you purchase it it supports a great cause.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So Much better than Rfd unit.
reviews.comment: This is so much more useful than the crapy unit that ETC sells.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recho5
reviews.comment: Love it. Once you learn where all the features are located it works great. I have been using it for control during services, no problems.
reviews.author: A Google User
